text: Jamie St John Bamber Griffith (born 3 April 1973) is an English actor. He was born in Hammersmith, London. People know him for his roles as Lee Adama in Battlestar Galactica, and Detective Sergeant Matt Devlin in Law & Order: UK. ==Personal life== Bamber is married to actress Kerry Norton. The couple have three daughters: Isla and identical twins Darcy and Ava.Jamie Bamber in People magazine ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Hammersmith Category:Actors from London Category:Living people
title: Jamie Bamber
